dope.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a drug that is not legal, especially marijuana
dope.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: Jeff used to smoke dope all the time.
dope.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to give a person or an animal a drug, often in their food or drink, to make them unconscious
dope.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: The girl had been doped and kidnapped.
dope.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: to give an animal a drug that makes it perform better in a race
